metadata.title: CVE-2021-47041 on Ubuntu 22.04 LTS (jammy) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:nvmet-tcp: fix incorrect locking in state_change sk callbackWe are not changing anything in the TCP connection state sowe should not take a write_lock but rather a read lock.This caused a deadlock when running nvmet-tcp and nvme-tcpon the same system, where state_change callbacks on thehost and on the controller side have causal relationshipand made lockdep report on this with blktests:================================WARNING: inconsistent lock state5.12.0-rc3 #1 Tainted: G
